name: Prateek Goel
body:
## Welcome to my page
My name is Prateek. I am a final year undergraduate student at Indian Institute of Technology, (BHU), Varanasi pursuing B.Tech in Electrical Engineering. I consider myself as a prospective student aspiring to excel in the field of Computer Science.

### Contact
* prateek.goel.eee13@iitbhu.ac.in    
* pgoel999@gmail.com
* [LinkedIn](https://in.linkedin.com/in/prateek-goel-b3b86ba2)   
* [GitHub](https://github.com/prateek1985)   

***
      
## CV   

### Education

#### [IIT (BHU), Varanasi](http://iitbhu.ac.in/) - 2013 to present
* **B.Tech in Electrical Engineering**
* **CGPA:** 8.65/10  

#### [Vidyasagar school, Indore](http://vidyasagarschool.org/) - 2011 to 2013
* **12th percentage -** 93.2%
* **10th CGPA:** 10/10 

### Skills and Interests

* **Languages:** Java, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5; Limited Proficiency – Matlab , C, PHP, MySql
* **Libraries & Software:** Yii framework, JavaCV, Eclipse
* **Areas of Interest:** Data Structures, Algorithms, Web Technologies

### Experience

#### Google Summer of Code 2016 - Working with [vitrivr.org](http://vitrivr.org/)                                              23 MAY – 23 AUG’16

* **Natural Language Query Interface**  
* **Mentor:** [Ivan Giangreco](https://dbis.cs.unibas.ch/team/ivan-giangreco) 

* Extended the Cineast user interface to support voice queries. Converted speech query input to text and
thereby build an interactive natural voice interface to fully control the Cineast using speech to retrieve videos from sketches and voice query given by user.

#### Research Experience                                                                                                  19 MAY – 20 JUL ’15

* **Enhancement of Economically Efficient Sentiment Stream Analysis of Twitter**  
* **Mentor:** Dr. Ravindranath Chowdary, Assistant Professor, CSE Department, IIT (BHU) Varanasi.

* Proposed and implemented Sort and Union algorithm in Java that modifies the two state of art algorithms
namely, Pareto and Kaldor-Hicks selective sampling algorithms used in sentiment stream analysis of Twitter,
resulting up to 3.5% and 21% improvement in time efficiency and 4.2% and 5.4% gain in prediction
performance in the respective algorithms.  

### Publications
* [Goel P, Chakraborty M, Chowdary C.R. Using Sort-Union to Enhance Economically-Efficient Sentiment Stream Analysis. Proceedings of the 3rd ACM IKDD Conference on Data Science, Article No. 19; 13th March 2016; Pune, India.](http://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?doid=2888451.2888468)

### Scholastic Achievements

* Secured AIR – 1985 in the JEE Advanced Examination 2013.
* Secured AIR – 2020 in the JEE Mains Examination 2013.
* Winner in Technex 2014, techno-management fest of IIT BHU Varanasi in the event Resonato.
* Runner up in Prastuti 2015, technical fest of Electrical Engineering, IIT BHU in the event Recognizance.
* Successfully completed course in core Java in 2014 summers.
* Secured AIR – 317 in Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana (KVPY) organized by IISc Bangalore in 2012.
* School Vice-Captain of Vidyasagar School, Indore in academic session 2011-12.

### Extra-Curricular Activities/Achievements 

* Participated in Wikipedia Hackathon organized at IIT Bombay, 2016
* Gold medalist in Inter Hostel Badminton Tournament, 2015 of IIT BHU.
* Coordinator of Badminton Tournament in Spardha 2014, Annual Sports fest of IIT BHU.
* Participated in Mosaic an image processing event in Aayam 2014, technical fest of Electronics branch.
* Participated in Robotics events based on image processing and aero-modeling events in Technex 2014,
techno-management fest of IIT BHU Varanasi.
